column4: Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
Of course~♡ I was going to do that anyway♡
I'm not going to let anything get between our happy lovey-dovey life♡
Babies can wait until we're older~♡

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: W-What!? A-Are you being serious right now?!
W-When I called you papa" and stuff in bed
We're still kids, and uhm, uhm, we can't raise a child, my parents would get mad and--
I'll talk to them. I'll make it work somehow. Just trust me.
T-That's unfair! I do trust you, but this is a major life decision…
It'll work out, just believe in me.
….O-Okay, if you say so. I suppose it'll just tie us together more so it won't be so bad~
Thank you for being so understanding.
